definition: Respond when his or her name is called (e.g. by turning and looking at the speaker)
Respond to ‘no’ (by stopping what she or he is doing, at least for a moment)
Extends an arm to show you something she or he is holding.
Shrugs to indicate ‘all gone’ or ‘where did it go’.
Pretend to ‘drink’ from a cup or other object.
Try to put nappy on it.
